name: Healthyfied Buttered Cabbage
description: This 'Healthyfied Buttered Cabbage' is a delightful twist on a classic dish, designed to fit into a health-conscious lifestyle with its low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar profile. Perfect for those looking to enjoy their favorite comfort foods in a healthier way.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the cabbage under cold water and then chop it into thin slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, heat the butter over medium heat until melted.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced cabbage to the skillet and saut√© for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cabbage is tender and slightly golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Season with ground pepper and stir well to combine. Continue to cook for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
